item.description:
The Somerville Maple Syrup Project is in its 10th year of tapping local trees, offering maple-themed workshops, and boiling down collected sap into tasty, authentic maple syrup! Join Groundwork Somerville at The Independent in Union Square for the annual Maple Syrup Project Fundraiser Brunch on MLK Day!

Enjoy delicious maple-themed dishes and cocktails while supporting the Boil Down Festival (March 9th), our Maple Syrup education programming, and local syrup production. 20% of proceeds from the brunch will go towards the Maple Syrupe Project, so just by attending you'll help us make this special anniversary of the project possible. Bring friends--and your appetite! Just make sure to call The Independent at 617-440-6022 to reserve a table, because space is limited!
item.name: Somerville Maple Syrup Project Fundraiser Brunch
